title: 3D Rasterizer
blurb: CPU-based OBJ file renderer written in C++. Uses Qt to render to a 512x512 image. Supports antialiasing up to 16x, and two shading models (Lambertian, Blinn-Phong).

imgs.alt: Mario OBJ file from Super Smash Bros. Brawl is rendered to the viewport.
Mario rendered with Blinn-Phong lighting and 9x antialiasing.
